title-group.article-title: Writing (on Deconstruction) at the Edge of Metaphysics

ref.mixed-citation: This essay was first presented to the Philosophy Society at the University of Warwick (England) in March 1982. It was also given as a Matchette Foundation Lecture at St. David's College, University of Wales (Lampeter, Wales) and again for the Philosophy Colloquium at Villanova University in April 1983.

Writing and Difference, tr. Alan Bass (Chicago: University of Chicago Press, 1978).
Jacques Derrida, Edmund Husserl's Origin of Geometry: An Introduction, tr. John P. Leavey (New York: Nicholas Hays, 1977).
Jacques Derrida, Positions, tr. Alan Bass (Chicago: University of Chicago Press, 1981)

Margins of Philosophy, tr. Alan Bass (Chicago: University of Chicago Press, 1982).

Jacques Derrida. La Carte Postale: de Socrate à Freud et au-delà (Paris: Aubier-Flammarion, 1980).
Les Fins de l'homme: à partir du travail de Jacques Derrida (Paris: Galilée, 1981)

Jacques Derrida, "Living On: Border Lines," pp. 75-176.

"Reading(s) of Jacques Derrida," pp. 45-65.
